__e: To our friends, we are grateful for your loyalty and support.
All I ask is your allegiance, and in return, I offer you the world.
That you'll pledge your undying devotion to me, and that I should do the same?
Each of you swore allegiance to me and to that cause...
I don't know, but she's with someone who owes allegiance to no one.
From now on, you owe allegiance to no one but yourselves.
Do you want to be crucified for what you have seen... or do you want to swear allegiance... to the new emperor?
All that a fellow has to do is ride into that Union camp down there raise his right hand and swear you'll be loyal to the United States.
